Judul: Symbolic Salvador: Exploring Symbolism in the Works of Dali
Abstrak: The author presents a sculpture art lessons for middle school students using Salvador Dali's painting "The Persistence of Memory." Information provided include an understanding on symbolism as an art concept, lessons on designing and creating three-dimensional sculptures, creating multi-media in sculptures, and application of the elements of perspective to clock-face numerals.
Sumber: Arts & Activities. May2016, Vol. 159 Issue 4, p16-17. 2p.
